select id from(
select to_char(to_date(max(day_id),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') ID from dw_4g_acct_day
select to_char(to_date(max(MONTH_ID),'yyyymm'),'yyyy-mm') ID from dw_4g_acct_month
)

select prov_id,pro_name,area_id,area_desc from (select p.prov_id,p.pro_name,a.area_id,a.area_desc,a.ord from dmcode_province p left join dmcode_area a on p.prov_id=a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark is not null and a.area_id !='999' union all select '111' prov_id,'全国' pro_name，area_id,area_desc,ord from dmcode_area where is_valid ='1'and area_id !='999' union all select '112' prov_id,'北十省'pro_name,a.area_id,a.area_desc,a.ord from dmcode_province p left join dmcode_area a on p.prov_id=a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark='10'and a.area_id !='999' union all select '113' prov_id,'南二十一省'pro_name,a.area_id,a.area_desc,a.ord from dmcode_province p left join dmcode_area a on p.prov_id=a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark='21'and a.area_id!='999'
) order by to_number(prov_id) desc,area_id asc

select r.module_code tabId,m.module_name tabName from dw_newquery_subject_module_rel r left join dw_newquery_subject_module m on r.module_code = m.module_code where 1=1
and r.subject_code=#{markType}

select r.kpi_code,k.kpi_name,k.unit,k.uatio,k.format from dw_newquery_module_kpi_rel r left join dw_newquery_kpi k on r.kpi_code=k.kpi_code where 1=1
and r.module_code=#{moduleId}
